name: mapEffect
signature: { <A, A2, E2>(f: (a: A) => Effect<A2, E2, never>): <E>(self: Fiber<A, E>) => Fiber<A2, E2 | E>; <A, E, A2, E2>(self: Fiber<A, E>, f: (a: A) => Effect<A2, E2, never>): Fiber<A2, E | E2>; }
